name: Constrain To Commit
description:
A short and hard platformer game where you are connected to your dark self. Can you collect all the coins without breaking the rope?

This is a game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #4.

Challenges added: Extra MonoChromatic.

Instructions:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Jump: Space

Note:

  • There is no reset button, so you have to restart the game to play again.
  • There is only 1 level, and no UI. You just boot it up and play. You'll know when you finish the level :).
  • If your rope breaks and flies all over the place, either die or restart the game. Here, this is normal. (Or because I was new to Unity and didn't have enough time to fix it)

This is also my first ever game made with Unity (I could've used Stencyl because I'm more used to it, but nah), and my first game on itch.io.

All feedbacks are appreciated, and thanks for playing!
